Description: Users experience app crashes, slow performance, and instability during peak usage and with large files.
Objective: Enhancing stability and performance will reduce user frustration and improve retention.
RICE Justification: Critical for user retention and satisfaction, affects all users, high confidence in need.
Kano Justification: Users expect basic reliability and stability, especially during peak usage.

Description: Users request support for exporting in various formats like PDF, Excel, CSV, XML, and JSON.
Objective: Offering versatile export options increases product utility and user satisfaction.
RICE Justification: Moderate impact, but high demand for varied export options.
Kano Justification: Users desire more formats, indicating a linear satisfaction with increased options.

Description: Users desire faster, more relevant search results accessible on mobile devices.
Objective: Efficient search improves user productivity and engagement.
RICE Justification: High demand for faster, more relevant search results, especially on mobile.
Kano Justification: Users expect fast and relevant search results as a standard feature.

Description: Users request custom fields, roles, permissions, notifications, and dashboards.
Objective: Customization enhances user control and satisfaction, catering to diverse business needs.
RICE Justification: High impact for power users, but complex to implement.
Kano Justification: Users want more customization, indicating satisfaction increases with more options.

Description: Users demand Two-Factor Authentication, SAML SSO, and multi-factor authentication.
Objective: Strengthening security builds trust and meets compliance requirements.
RICE Justification: Security is a top priority for users, high impact on trust and retention.
Kano Justification: Users demand these features for basic security expectations.

Description: Users face issues with excessive, delayed, or missing notifications.
Objective: Reliable notifications ensure timely communication and user engagement.
RICE Justification: Moderate impact, improves user experience with notifications.
Kano Justification: Users expect reliable and timely notifications as a standard feature.

Description: Users request integration with Google Drive, Zapier, Trello, webhooks, and custom domains.
Objective: Broadening integrations enhances product ecosystem and user workflow efficiency.
RICE Justification: High demand for integrations, improves user workflow and satisfaction.
Kano Justification: Users desire more integrations, indicating satisfaction increases with more options.

Description: Users need dark mode, larger fonts, mobile responsiveness, and screen reader compatibility.
Objective: Improving UI and accessibility broadens user base and satisfaction.
RICE Justification: Important for user satisfaction and accessibility, moderate effort required.
Kano Justification: Features like dark mode and screen reader compatibility delight users unexpectedly.

Description: Users experience issues with password resets, email changes, and team invitations.
Objective: Streamlining user management reduces support costs and enhances user experience.
RICE Justification: Important for user experience, but limited reach.
Kano Justification: Users expect basic functionality for managing user accounts.

Description: Users request custom reports and usage statistics.
Objective: Enhanced analytics provide insights for decision-making and demonstrate product value.
RICE Justification: Valuable for data-driven users, moderate reach.
Kano Justification: Users want more detailed reports, indicating satisfaction increases with more options.

Description: Users request tutorials with videos or GIFs.
Objective: Effective onboarding reduces churn and accelerates user adoption.
RICE Justification: Helps new users, moderate impact on retention.
Kano Justification: Users desire more comprehensive tutorials, indicating satisfaction increases with better resources.

Feature Name: Enhanced Task and Project Management Features
Description: Users desire recurring tasks, reminders, timeline views, and calendar views.
Objective: Advanced management features increase productivity and user satisfaction.
RICE Justification: High impact on productivity, but requires significant effort.
Kano Justification: Users want more features, indicating satisfaction increases with more options.

Feature Name: Reliability and Performance for Large Teams
Description: Users express dissatisfaction with app reliability and performance for large teams and projects.
Objective: Ensuring reliability for large teams supports scalability and enterprise adoption.
RICE Justification: Essential for large teams, high impact on retention.
Kano Justification: Users expect reliability and performance for large teams as a basic requirement.

Description: Users request project duplication, data import, and approval workflows.
Objective: Enhanced data management streamlines operations and increases efficiency.
RICE Justification: Moderate impact, useful for data-heavy users.
Kano Justification: Users desire more data management options, indicating satisfaction increases with more features.

Description: Users express satisfaction with new interface design, project templates, and notification center.
Objective: Positive feedback validates recent improvements and guides future updates.
RICE Justification: Positive feedback on recent updates, but low impact on new features.
Kano Justification: Users express unexpected delight with new updates, indicating high satisfaction.

Description: Users request comprehensive lists of users, tasks, projects, and integrations.
Objective: Providing detailed views enhances management capabilities and user control.
RICE Justification: Useful for project managers, but moderate impact.
Kano Justification: Users desire more comprehensive views, indicating satisfaction increases with more detailed information.
